quotes.message: In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
quotes.name: Douglas Horton

quotes.message: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations.
quotes.name: Paul Rand

quotes.message: Nothing is more simple than greatness; indeed, to be simple is to be great.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
quotes.name: Frederic Chopin

quotes.message: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Live simply, so that others may simply live.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Our life is frittered away by detail simplify, simplify, simplify!
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: Simplicity embarks not on what is seen by the naked eye, but dwelling on what is in the heart.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The most complicated skill is to be simple.
quotes.name: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.message: Simplicity is an exact medium between too little and too much.
quotes.name: Sir Joshua Reynolds

quotes.message: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
quotes.name: Hans Hofman

quotes.message: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.name: Charles Warner

quotes.message: The trouble with simple living is that, though it can be joyful, rich, and creative, it isn't simple.
quotes.name: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.message: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Simplicity is indeed often the sign of truth and a criterion of beauty.
quotes.name: Mahlon Hoagland

quotes.message: Simplicity is the shortest path to a solution.
quotes.name: Ward Cunningham

quotes.message: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability.
quotes.name: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.message: Simplicity the art of maximizing the amount of work not done is essential.
quotes.name: Principles Behind The Agile Manifesto

quotes.message: Simplicity is a state of mind.
quotes.name: Charles Wagner

quotes.message: A little simplification would be the first step toward rational living, I think.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: A taste for simplicity cannot last for long.
quotes.name: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.message: As beautiful as simplicity is, it can become a tradition that stands in the way of exploration.
quotes.name: Laura Nyro

quotes.message: I despise simplicity. It is the negation of all that is beautiful.
quotes.name: Norman Hartnell

quotes.message: I don't need a lot of money. Simplicity is the answer for me.
quotes.name: Linda McCartney

quotes.message: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Seek simplicity but distrust it.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: Simplicity does not precede complexity, but follows it.
quotes.name: Alan Perlis

quotes.message: Simplicity involves unburdening your life, and living more lightly with fewer distractions that interfere with a high quality life, as defined uniquely by each individual. You will find people living simply in large cities, rural areas and everything in between.
quotes.name: Linda Breen Pierce

quotes.message: Simplicity is not an objective in art, but one achieves simplicity despite one's self by entering into the real sense of things.
quotes.name: Constantin Brancusi

quotes.message: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Simplicity is the nature of great souls.
quotes.name: Papa Ramadas

quotes.message: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in.
quotes.name: Francis Jourdain

quotes.message: Never use a long word when a short one will do.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: I relish simplicity as an all-comprehensive value.
quotes.name: Ela Bhatt

quotes.message: Simplicity is the seal of truth.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art.
quotes.name: Philip James Bailey

quotes.message: There is a simplicity that exists on the far side of complexity, and there is a communication of sentiment and attitude not to be discovered by careful exegesis of a text.
quotes.name: Patrick J. Buchanan

quotes.message: Be content with what you have, rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Simplicity is a jewel rarely found.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Simplicity of all things is the hardest to be copy.
quotes.name: Richard Steele

quotes.message: There is one show of breeding vulgarity seldom assumes, simplicity.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: Simplicity is a captivating grace in woman, as rare as it is attractive.
quotes.name: J. De Finod

quotes.message: Simplicity is that grace which frees the soul from all unnecessary reflections upon itself.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: Genuine simplicity of heart is a healing and cementing principle.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Upright simplicity is the deepest wisdom, and perverse craft the merest shallowness.
quotes.name: Isaac Barrow
